casebody.data:
No. 09-980. British American Tobacco (Investments) Limited, Petitioner v. United States, et al. 561 U.S. 1054, 131 S. Ct. 57,

177 L. Ed. 2d 1142,

2010 U.S. LEXIS 5689. September 3, 2010.

Petition for rehearing denied.

Justice Kagan took no part in the consideration or decision of this petition.

Former decision, 561 U.S. 1025, 130 S. Ct. 3502, 177 L. Ed. 2d 1090, 2010 U.S. LEXIS 5450.
